Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Racine
ShortDescription: 79 79th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Loomis, 76th, Halsted, 79th and over regular route: due to, street blockage near 79th/Racine.

Headline: Howard bound Red  Line Service Delayed at 79th
ShortDescription: Howard bound Red Line trains are standing at 79th due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard bound Red Line trains are standing at 79th due to police activity.

At this time also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
